text: Oni tebya o regulakh u zhenshchin voproshayut. Skazhi: "Siye yest' tech' i nedug". A potomu vam nadlezhit Derzhat'sya v storone na eto vremya I k nim ne prikasat'sya, poka oni ne budut chisty. Kogda zh oni proydut obmyv, Vy prodolzhayte s neyu zdravuyu supruzheskuyu svyaz', Kak vam Allakh naznachil, - Allakh ved' lyubit tekh, kto obrashchayetsya k Nemu, I tekh, kto v chistote sebya soderzhit
